metadata.title: CVE-2024-35328 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libyaml v0.2.5 is vulnerable to DDOS. Affected by this issue is thefunction yaml_parser_parse of the file /src/libyaml/src/parser.c.

criterions.comment: libyaml package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
libyaml-libyaml-perl package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-goyaml package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
